channel.title: Surround Sound under Linux
channel.description:
Hi Black Mesa Forum :blush:
I'm playing Black Mesa on Manjaro Linux with a Asus Maximus Ranger VII Mobo, which has an Realtek ALC1150 Sound Chip, and connected via SPDIF (optical) a Logitech Z906 Soundsystem.
Surround Sound is working fine, for example, when playing a DVD. But in the options of Black Mesa I can only select a 2 Speaker setup.':astonished: Under Windows Surround Sound is working fine with Black Mesa.
Is there a way to enable surround sound in Black Mesa on Linux?

item.title: Surround Sound under Linux
item.dc:creator: hompen
item.description:
Hi Black Mesa Forum

I’m playing Black Mesa on Manjaro Linux with a Asus Maximus Ranger VII Mobo, which has an Realtek ALC1150 Sound Chip, and connected via SPDIF (optical) a Logitech Z906 Soundsystem.

Surround Sound is working fine, for example, when playing a DVD.
But in the options of Black Mesa I can only select a 2 Speaker setup.’
Under Windows Surround Sound is working fine with Black Mesa.

Is there a way to enable surround sound in Black Mesa on Linux?

Read full topic
